title: Warm vegetarian sausage & puy lentil salad

ingredients.item: 2 small red onions, cut into thin wedges
250g pouch Merchant Gourmet tomatoey puy & green lentils
Handful flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large frying pan. Add the sausages to the pan with the rosemary, and fry over a medium- high heat for about 10 minutes, turning frequently, until golden and piping hot. Lift the sausages out of the pan (leave the rosemary), add the remaining 1 tbsp oil, then add the onion wedges and fry on a medium heat for 12-15 minutes, until golden and soft.

Add the vinegar and mustard, stir to combine, then remove the rosemary and stir in the lentils until warmed through; season. Slice the sausages and add to the lentils, along with the parsley. Serve on plates with the rocket.
